normalized: the two sexually excited, despicably whorish women officers stood in the brainwashing lab.
the equipment i had requested by dr.
magnus prior was being set up on their heads.
it was a portable controller unit that had been made during their maintenance time.
once it was furnished onto their heads, it would be possible, for example, to do things like temporarily control their five senses…
once i had grasped control of their bodies, i would be able to do things like move their bodies freely.
and now, due to that equipment, they stood stock still, being stupefied like puppets.
while i gazed at them with a derisive smile on my face, i received hans' report.

name: hans
normalized: brainwashing status as of now is approximately 90%

name: bohgan
normalized: 90%…so that means….

name: hans
normalized: yes.
by tomorrow, their former personalities will be completely gone

name: bohgan
normalized: is that so
hans floated an obscene smile at me as i continued nodding slightly.

name: hans
normalized: what now?

name: bohgan
normalized: …huh?

name: hans
normalized: shall i immediately erase…their former personalities?

name: bohgan
normalized: …no
i shook my head at hans' inquiry.
i didn't want to immediately erase--the very personalities that made lieri and naomi who they were-- their former personalities.
after all, there was a reason why i had the equipment, that was now installed on their heads, made.

name: bohgan
normalized: anyway, everyone, you've done a great job so far.
i honestly feel proud of you all
i thanked the research lab staff's efforts.
all the brainwashing specialists extolled mutual full faced smiles in delight of their joint effort in having accomplished an almost complete brainwashing mission.
of course, my trustworthy mad scientists could not hide their excitement of the tremendous results of brainwashing two of the most important new solar figures.
i also wanted very much to erupt in further congratulations, but…
according to lieri's and naomi's plans, four battleships were set to ambush the jasant tomorrow.
i had altered course in secret having discovered that en route, but it seemed likely that that would somehow be leaked to those two.
and, it was also very likely that they would become aware of the course adjustment the jasant made.
the fact was, this wasn't over by a long shot.

name: bohgan
normalized: kukukuu…in any case, you will be fully brainwashed by tomorrow.
what will you do then?
lieri…naomi…
if their brainwashing rate of progression reaches 100% by tomorrow night…
once their old personalities are gone, they will be fully under my control to manipulate as i please, regardless whether it's day or night.
in other words, the daytime tomorrow will be their last chance.
victory seems--inevitable.
--two days until earth's arrival.
i also wanted very much to erupt in further congratulations, but…
were lieri and naomi truly corrupted now…?
i had an inkling that something was wrong.

name: bohgan
normalized: their brainwashing would be completed tomorrow night but….
and if their brainwashing proceeds to 100% tomorrow night….
once their old personalities are gone, they will be fully under my control to manipulate as i please, regardless whether it's day or night.
in other words, the daytime tomorrow will be their last chance.
under the circumstances, it seemed impossible to do anything about that.
so, victory looked to be inevitable.
--two days until earth's arrival.
